name: TZP Wine Club 2026
description: Welcome to TZP WINE CLUB — our most personal, thoughtful way to share what we’re loving. Each quarter, you'll receive a curated selection of our favorite bottles of the season, including occasional exclusive gems and limited-run discoveries you won’t find on our site. Choose all red wines or a variety of wines based on

name: All The Bitter Classic Bitters Travel Pack (1 oz travel)
description: Airplane and purse friendly minis of All the Bitter's core flavors of non-alcoholic bitters. Created by sommeliers, these are perfect for making cocktails or simply mixing with soda water. Includes Aromatic, Orange, and New Orleans style alcohol-free bitters.

name: Oddbird's Blanc de Blancs Non-Alcoholic Sparkling Wine
description: Perfect for celebrating life's memorable occasions. Organic Chardonnay & Colombard aged in oak for 12 months for a mature, complex wine. Honeyed nose, crisp fruit on the palate, with rich, velvety bubbles and a creamy brioche finish.

name: BREZ Flow (4-Pack)
description: Discover bright Italian lemon and fragrant elderflower in this bubbly refresher. Infused with Lion's Mane mushroom for increased mental clarity and relaxation, it's best enjoyed sipped straight from a chilled can or served over ice with a squeeze of lemon.

name: The Pathfinder's Hemp & Root Non-Alcoholic Spirit
description: Meet The Pathfinder Hemp & Root. A non-alcoholic spirit of its own class. Distilled and complex. Bittersweet and flavorful. Citrus, spice, and a whole bunch of roots and herbs: wormwood, angelic root, ginger, juniper, and orange peel, to name a few.Serve it neat, on the rocks, or in a cocktail. Shines in a spritz.

name: Leitz's Zero Point Five Non-Alcoholic Pinot Noir
description: A juicy crush of red and black cherries, cranberries, and the characteristic mushroom earthiness typical of traditional Pinot Noir. Subtle tannins contribute a rich mouthfeel, for a non-alcoholic red wine that shines alongside Sunday roasts and game. Try it slightly chilled with lamb biryani and thank us later.

name: Lapo's Non-Alcoholic Negroni (Cans)
description: Lapo’s Non Alcoholic Negroni was born in Florence, Italy’s most famous bar, where a smiling barman in a tuxedo – Lapo – serves the best negroni in town. This cocktail is perfectly bittersweet, with notes of juniper and bright citrus. It’s also lightly sparkling and “molto bitter.” You can drink chilled from the can or

name: Leitz's Eins Zwei Zero Non-Alcoholic Chardonnay
description: From the Palatine wine-growing region of Germany, this non-alcoholic Chardonnay is one of our best-sellers. Packed with fall orchard fruit flavors like apple and pear and a balancing spritz of lemon. A European-style Chard, it's not particularly buttery, but don't worry-- there's still plenty of oak on the long, dry fi

name: Oddbird's GSM Non-Alcoholic Red Wine
description: Bold and juicy non-alcoholic red wine. Jammy blackberries and dried cherries balanced by gentle acidity. Finishes with just enough tannins to bring you back for another sip. Grenache, Syrah, Mourvèdre & Carignan from Saint-Chinian, France.

name: ISH's Spritz Non-Alcoholic Aperol Spritz Cocktail
description: The perennially popular cocktail, now booze-free. Non-alcoholic Aperol spritz with all the bittersweet orange, woodsy herbs, and touch of vanilla you crave. Drink it straight from the chilled can for an effortless refreshment, or pour it over ice and garnish with an orange slice.

name: ISH's G&T Non-Alcoholic Gin & Tonic Cocktail (Cans)
description: Nothing is more refreshing than a classic gin and tonic... and now you can drink as many as you like without the hangover. A crisp blend of ISH London Botanical Spirit non-alcoholic gin and bracing tonic. Notes of juniper, quinine, rosemary, coriander, and black pepper. Pour over ice and garnish with fresh rosemary, or

name: Giesen's 0% Non-Alcoholic Sauvignon Blanc
description: Non-alcoholic white wine that represents the classic flavors you expect from this varietal. Marlborough grapes? Check. All the tart passion fruit, lemon shortbread, earthy blackcurrant, and grassy notes that define New Zealand Savvy B? Check. Consistently one of our best-selling wines. Grab a case and pour yourself an

name: Best Selling Non-Alcoholic Wine Bundle
description: A collection of our best-selling non-alcoholic wines. Sample new bottles alongside your favorites, stock up for a dinner party, or just your end of day pour. Bundles are our at-home alternative to exploring a wine shop or cellar. Delivered straight to your door, they offer you the liberty of tasting different flavors,

name: Leitz's Eins Zwei Zero Non-Alcoholic Riesling
description: Popular and straightforward non-alcoholic Riesling from Rheingau, the world-renowned growing region for Riesling grapes. Still, dealcoholized white wine with orange, rhubarb, and tarragon flavors. Charmingly versatile as a compliment to food. Clean and crisp with a dry finish.

name: Noughty's Rouge Dealcoholized Red Wine
description: Spicy non-alcoholic red wine from South African Syrah. Medium bodied, with notes of candied cherry, dried rose petal, and a big punch of freshly ground black pepper. Fairly high acidity, but French oak tannins reign it in on the finish.

name: Oddbird's Non-Alcoholic Sparkling Rosé
description: Non-alcoholic sparkling rosé bursting with ripe summer raspberries. Made from 100% organic Syrah from Provence. All natural, deep pink color. Silky bubbles, semi-dry finish, and very easy to drink. Go on, finish the whole bottle.

name: Oddbird's Blanc de Blancs Non-Alcoholic Sparkling White Wine (Cans)
description: Crisp and modern non-alcoholic sparkling wine. Zesty acidity, with notes of tart green apple and a spritz of lime. Throw these in a cooler and take anywhere for crushable refreshment.
duplicateWith: Oddbird's Blanc de Blancs Non-Alcoholic Sparkling Wine

name: Leitz's Eins Zwei Zero Non-Alcoholic Rose (Cans)
description: Crafted from Pinot Noir grapes, this non-alcoholic sparkling rosé evokes the essence of summer. With vibrant notes of red fruits and sky berries, rose hips, and lean minerality. Invigorating bubbles and balanced flavor make it an ideal aperitif or a versatile ingredient for spritz cocktails.
duplicateWith: Leitz's Eins Zwei Zero Non-Alcoholic Riesling

description: A collection of our best-selling non-alcoholic red wines. Sample new bottles alongside your favorites, stock up for a dinner party, or just your end of day pour. Bundles are our at-home alternative to exploring a wine shop or cellar. Delivered straight to your door, they offer you the liberty of tasting different flavo

name: Saint Viviana's Non-Alcoholic Sauvignon Blanc
description: Dry and lively non-alcoholic Sauvignon Blanc from Washington State. Green herbs on the nose, ripe orange, grapefruit, and melon on the palate. Bracing acidity for a mouthwatering finish that brings you back for another sip... or gulp. Saint Viviana starts with super premium wine, which means fewer additives. Fewer addi
